statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -3 \\ 0 \\ -5 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ -1 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 9 \\ -3 \\ 16 \\ 6 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 15 \\ 3 \\ 18 \\ -20 \\ -12 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -3 \\ 0 \\ -5 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ -1 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 9 \\ -3 \\ 16 \\ 6 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 15 \\ 3 \\ 18 \\ -20 \\ -12 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
